content:
This website serves as a central hub for release notes of all Propromo repositories. Here you’ll find detailed information about updates, changes, and new features across the Propromo organization.
What is Propromo? Propromo is a Project Progress Monitoring tool that helps you share your project progress with clients. It provides a streamlined way to keep stakeholders informed about development progress and updates.
summary: This website serves as a central hub for release notes of all Propromo repositories. Here you’ll find detailed information about updates, changes, and new features across the Propromo organization.
title: About Propromo Releases
